name: $description
desc: Returns: A brief, natural language description of the condition that effectively communicates the intended semantics.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A brief, natural language description of the condition that effectively communicates the intended semantics.

name: $language
desc: Returns: The media type of the language for the expression, e.g. "text/cql" for Clinical Query Language expressions or "text/fhirpath" for FHIRPath expressions.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The media type of the language for the expression, e.g. "text/cql" for Clinical Query Language expressions or "text/fhirpath" for FHIRPath expressions.

name: $expression
desc: Returns: An expression that returns true or false, indicating whether the condition is satisfied. When using FHIRPath expressions, the %context environment variable must be replaced at runtime with the ChargeItem resource to which this definition is applied.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An expression that returns true or false, indicating whether the condition is satisfied. When using FHIRPath expressions, the %context environment variable must be replaced at runtime with the ChargeItem resource to which this definition is applied.
